refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: SoapParam is a special low-level class for naming parameters and return values in nonWSDL mode. It is just a data holder and it has not any special method except constructor. The constructor takes data to pass or return and name. It is possible to pass parameters directly as PHP value, but in this case it will be named as paramN and SOAP Service may not understand them.

example.title: Some examples
example.programlisting: <?php $client = new SoapClient(null,array('location' => "http://localhost/soap.php", 'uri' => "http://test-uri/")); $client->SomeFunction(new SoapParam($a,"a"), new SoapParam($b,"b"), new SoapParam($c,"c")); ?>
